conbody.p: This section of the document describes the contents of the HIC-held datasets currently made available to researchers and data analysts. HICâ€™s data collection strategy is well-developed, covering long-term collections of whole populations, such as Scottish Morbidity Register (SMR) hospitalisation data, official death certification data, and dispensed community prescription data, to short-term collections and disease-specific coverage, such as the GoDARTS (Genetics of Diabetes Audit and Research in Tayside, Scotland). These datasets comes in various formats and are curated, maintained and governed by HIC.
